```{r,warning=FALSE}

library(primer.data)
library(tidyverse)
```

Preceptor Table: unit=cadidates for maor, outcomes=how long they lived, covariates=sex.

Validity: Can be assumed

```{r}
governors |>
  filter(state == "Massachusetts") |>
    select(state, lived_after, sex) |>
      ggplot(aes(x = lived_after)) +
      geom_density(aes(color = sex)) +
      scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 60))
```
